name: Void Dogs (WIP)
description:
Description:

This game is in its very early stages of development!

This is a currently Untitled Arena Shooter that will be co-op! The overall theme will be Steampunk Space Pirates.  As future iterations come, the narrative will be much clearer, as will the theme as our art evolves. For now, however, please enjoy this quick demo to see what kind of feel we're striving towards!

While this game is intended to be co-op in the future, that functionality is still being developed.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Shift to dash
  • L to restart the level
  • R to reload
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Q to switch weapons
Credits: Designers:
